response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only represents a significant investment on our part but also embodies years of research and innovation. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it's worth more than its face value to those who truly appreciate its benefits. Considering its exceptional value, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $15,000. This opportunity is tailored to discerning individuals like yourself who seek unparalleled experiences and outcomes. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you're interested in securing this remarkable product.", "product_price": 15000}
